name: SmMOKEABLE HOODIE White & Pink  KEEP IT HOOD
description:
Built In PIPE Drawstring Smokeable Hoodie! Patent Pending. Discreet Glass Mouthpiece and Bowl Piece Each Hand Blown In California. Connected To Hidden Inner High Temp Silicone Tubing. Smoke Travels Thru The Drawstring And Out The Other Side. Pipe Removes Quickly And Easyily For Washing Of Hoodie And Cleaning Of The Pipe.. Reinserted Into Hoodie With Ease. Comes With Regular Drawstring Too. (PIPE Only Included If Selected WITH PIPE!) .... WITHOUT PIPE $64.99!!!

Heavyweight 10oz Polyester Fleece Hoodie. Hidden Lighter Pocket Inside Front Pocket. Comfortable and Durable. Machine Washable. Sizes Run Small, So Keep It Hood and Order Bigger Sizes.

Each Hoodie Is Hand Made And Assembled In Santa Cruz, California.  So Please Allow 2-6 Weeks For Delivery. Please Feel Free To Contact Us At (831) 316-4675 With Any Questions. Or Email HoodHorkerz@gmail.com  

This Product Is For Tobacco Use Only 
MUST BE 18+ TO BUY WITH PIPE!!
Under 18 May Buy WITHOUT PIPE!! ($64.99)

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM; @hood_horkerz_clothing  .....For Special Deals and Exclusive Products
